{{Description|[[Shousen]], the master of Inazuma's [[Shinryuu]], offers to help the [[Traveler]] initiate an imaginary, no-holds-barred fighting tournament, with a chance to win rewards for it.}}
'''Phantom Flow''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 2.0]].

During the event, complete challenges of various difficulties to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]], [[Talent Level-Up Materials]], and [[Mora]].

It can be found at the [[File:Icon Contending Tides.svg|25x25px]] map icon.

==Event Details==
===Duration===
Event Duration: 2021/08/20 10:00 - 2021/08/30 03:59

===Requirements===
*[[Adventure Rank]] 30 or above
*Complete the Archon Quest "[[Ritou Escape Plan]]" and the World Quest "[[Chisato's Letter]]"

===Summary===
* From the first day onward, a new challenge will be unlocked each day. Each of these will have a "Shoden" and an "Okuden" mode. Shoden Mode features three difficulty levels: Normal, Hard, and Extreme. Completing it at a higher difficulty will automatically complete the lower difficulties. Okuden Mode only unlocks after completing Extreme difficulty in Shoden Mode.
* Each challenge has three completion criteria, and all of them must be completed for the challenge to be considered a success.
* Each challenge features unique Shinryuu Mechanics that have their own special effects. Take note of them and use them to your advantage during the challenges.
* During the event, adjusting your World Level will not affect the level of opponents in the challenge or challenge difficulty in general.
* Phantom Flow is only available in Single-Player Mode.

==Challenges==
===[[File:Enemy Treasure Hoarders: Scout Icon.png|40px]] Electrograna's Triumph===
Unlocked on 2021-08-20

;Shinryuu Mechanics

When carrying an [[Electrograna|Electrogranum]], the Energy Recharge of all characters in the party is increased by 100%.<br>Additionally, using 3 Elemental Burst(s) within 10s will unleash a bolt of lightning to strike a maximum of 5 random opponents nearby, dealing {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.<br>[Okuden difficulty only]: During the Okuden challenge, a Thundersign will appear at the character's current position when they create lightning bolts in the aforementioned way. After a short delay, the Thundersign will explode, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}} to the character at that position.

===[[File:Enemy Mutant Electro Slime Icon.png|40px]] Mister Connected===
Unlocked on 2021-08-23

; Shinryuu Mechanics

Nimbus Gems that release electric pulses to link up with characters who are carrying Electrograna or affected by Electro will appear during this challenge.<br>When linked to a Nimbus Gem, characters will lose 5% HP every 3s, and will restore 5% when they defeat opponents.<br>Additionally, characters will gain the following effects depending on the number of Nimbus Gems linked to them:
*1 Gem: All characters in the party gain 50% Energy Recharge.
*2 Gems: All characters in the party also gain 1000 ATK.
*3 Gems: Characters' Normal, Charged, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts that hit opponents will also unleash shockwaves at that opponent's position, dealing DMG to the surrounding opponents. 1 shockwave may be created in this way every 2s.
[Okuden difficulty only]: During the Okuden challenge, a Thundersign will appear at a character's current position once they have defeated an opponent. After a short delay, the Thundersign will erupt, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}} to characters within its AoE.

Unlocked on 2021-08-25

;Shinryuu Mechanics
A special Thunder Dwelling is present during this challenge. When hit by a character's {{Electro}} attacks, it will charge up when characters who are affected by {{Electro}} or who carry Electrograna are nearby.<br>Once fully charged, the Thunder Dwelling will unleash a Thunder Shock that deals DMG to both characters and opponents within the challenge arena.
